doc:
Lucile Saint-Simon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucile_Saint-Simon 0 Lucile Saint-Simon (born October 19, 1932) is a French actress from the Paris suburb of Corbeil-Essonnes. She appeared in such feature films as Les Bonnes Femmes (1960), The Hands of Orlac (1962), La donnaccia (Italian, 1965). In 2011, the LA Times called her a "forgotten actress." Lucile_Saint-Simon ( born October_19_,_1932 ) is a_French_actress from the_Paris_suburb of Corbeil-Essonnes . She appeared in such_feature_films as Les_Bonnes_Femmes_(_1960_) , The_Hands of Orlac_(_1962_) , La_donnaccia_(_Italian , 1965_) . In 2011 , the_LA_Times called her a_"_forgotten_actress .
